data.title: Asus Laptop
data.description: Whether it's working on a presentation, streaming movies and music, or playing games, the Asus ZenBook Pro 15 is your ideal companion for work or play. Featuring an awe-inspiring design, the NanoEdge 4K UHD Ultraslim-bezel Display, an 8th Generation Intel Core i9 hexa-core processor, and a powerful Li-ion battery, this laptop brings to you the best of both worlds in terms of style and performance.

data.title: X Box
data.description: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback1, adaptive triggers1 and 3D Audio*, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games.

data.title: Whirlpool refrigerator
data.description: With this Whirlpool refrigerator in your home, eat fresh food every single day to live a healthy and happy life. This refrigerator features the Adaptive Intelligence technology, the IntelliSense Inverter Technology, and the Zeolite Technology for consistent cooling and long-lasting freshness of your edibles..

data.title: Sony headphones
data.description: Industry Leading noise cancellation-two processors control 8 microphones for unprecedented noise cancellation. With Auto NC Optimizer, noise cancelling is automatically optimized based on your wearing conditions and environment.

data.title: Philips Trimmer
data.description: This cooking appliance features a Detachable Non-stick Basket and Pan for your convenience, a Fast Air Circulation Technology for quick and even cooking, and Adjustable Temperature and Time functions to cook as per your preferences..
